application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details of an enhanced sound insulation value of at least 5dB above the maximum Building Regulations value, for the floor/ceiling/wall structures separating different types of rooms/uses in adjoining dwellings/areas, namely, bedrooms/ studio bedspace below/above/adjoining kitchen/living/dining/bathroom of separate flat and of at least 10dB enhancement for bedrooms adjoining the communal main entrances, pathway and staircase in pursuant to condition 10 of planning permission 241447FUL dated 22/05/2024 for: Construction of a three-storey building to accommodate 5no. self-contained flats, with associated car parking, refuse and cycle storage, amenity space and associated changes to the boundary treatment (following demolition of existing building).
